item.title: [pi] give Something [pi]
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

I made a simple command to get yourself epp, maybe itll help a pinch.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("epptest")) { c.pkPoints = (c.pkPoints + 2000); c.sendMessage("2,000 Epp delivered"); }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] give Something [pi]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("give5dp")) {
    final String recipient = playerCommand.substring(8);
    for (final Client c2 : PlayerHandler.players) {
        if (c2 != null && c2.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(recipient)) {
            c2.dPoints += 5;
            c2.sendMessage("You have been given donator Points by " + c.playerName);
            //c2.logout();// NOTE: Why are you logging them out?
            return;
        }
    }
    c.sendMessage(String.format("\"%s\" is not online.", recipient));
}

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] give Something [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“chazion, post:8, topic:414351”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=516309.msg3747177#msg3747177 date=1315772579]

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("give5dp")) {
			try {
				final String donorPoints = playerCommand.substring(8);
				for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if (PlayerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if (PlayerHandler.players[i].playerName
								.equalsIgnoreCase(donorPoints)) {
							final Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[i];
							c2.sendMessage("You have been given donator Points by " + c.playerName);
							c2.dPoints += 5;
							c2.logout();
							return;
						}
					}
				}
			} catch (final Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Online.");
				return;
			}
		}

…
[/quote]

Wrong…keeps saying player is offline[/quote]

Is the player offline?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] give Something [pi]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Gosh… all of you are wrong.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("givepoints")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); String otherplayer = args[1]; int point = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); for(int i = 0; i < PlayerHandler.players.length; i++) { if(PlayerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(PlayerHandler.players[i].playerName. equalsIgnoreCase(otherplayer)) { Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[i]; c2.dPoints += point; c.sendMessage("@blu@You have given" + " "+otherplayer+", "+point+" Donator Points."); c2.sendMessage("@red@You have been given" + " "+point+" Donator Points by "+c.playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Wrong syntax! ::givepoints name amount"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] give Something [pi]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givepoints")) { try { String playerToG = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToG)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].dPoints += 5; c.sendMessage("You have given "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" 5 Donator Points from: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); Server.playerHandler.players[i].isDonator = 0; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] give Something [pi]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“chazion, post:1, topic:414351”]I’m making a command that adds dp (donor points) to a character when i type this command.

the problem is that it’s just not working, i ripped most the command from the givedonor command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("give5dp")) { try { String playerToMod = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToMod)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been given donator Points by " + c.playerName); c2.dPoints += 5; c2.logout(); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }[/quote]
Define what you mean by “not working”

item.title: [pi] give Something [pi]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

I’m making a command that adds dp (donor points) to a character when i type this command.

the problem is that it’s just not working, i ripped most the command from the givedonor command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("give5dp")) { try { String playerToMod = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToMod)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been given donator Points by " + c.playerName); c2.dPoints += 5; c2.logout(); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }
